FormalParameter.Name: URL to TXW Web Service
FormalParameter.Description: String representing the URL of TXW Web Service operation to execute (e.g. http://localhost:8080/txw/TXWService).

FormalParameter.Name: The XML data used to call TXW Web Service
FormalParameter.Description: XML Node representing the data for calling TXW Web Service.

FormalParameter.Name: Determines if send/receive operation should be called
FormalParameter.Description: Should be set to 'true' if send/receive operation should be called.

FormalParameter.Name: Username for TXW Web Service authentication
FormalParameter.Description: Username used to authenticate to TXW Web Service.

FormalParameter.Name: Password for TXW Web Service authentication
FormalParameter.Description: Password used to authenticate to TXW Web Service.

FormalParameter.Name: TXW return code
FormalParameter.Description: Should be set to 'true' if send/receive operation should be called.

FormalParameter.Name: The XML data received from TXW Web Service call
FormalParameter.Description: XML Node representing the data received from TXW Web Service call.
